author: buscob
msg: This allows to move the portlet rendered using the include-portal-page widget using the same service used for the portlet drag and drop.
Redundant moving services will be removed when the include-portal-page widget will have completely established.

author: buscob
msg: Added new PORTALPAGE_ADMIN permission (this will replace the existing PORTALPAGE_MAINT in next commits)
